name: Litehouse Wellness
description: A non-profit wellness center in Dallas, Texas, founded by a yoga and meditation teacher. They focus on bridging the wellness accessibility gap for Black men and creating safe spaces for restorative practices
services: Black-owned Meditation instruction in Texas consultation

name: Vitality by Kym (VBK)
description: A holistic mental health wellness center in Houston, Texas, specializing in managing conditions such as depression, anxiety, PTSD, and ADHD. They combine psychotherapy, wellness coaching, and medication management

name: The Learning Spa: Cultural Inner Wellness Oasis
description: This is a planned wellness oasis in North Dallas, Texas, aiming to offer an alternative approach to inner well-being for African Americans and people of color. It is intended to provide private meditation listening rooms and culturally relevant workshops
services: Black-owned Meditation instruction in Texas consultation

name: HoneyBeNatural Wellness (H O N E Y B E L I T E)
address: 110 E. Main St. Suite 100 | Grand Prairie, TX 75050
description: Offers movement classes focused on Kemetic Yoga and Aerial Lyra Hoop, incorporating meditation, mindfulness, and affirmations

name: Zen Wellness Studio
description: A wellness and fitness space in Cedar Hill, Texas, offering Pilates, yoga, and sculpt classes rooted in mindful movement and community. They emphasize supporting the nervous system

name: Soul Tribes Yoga + Meditation
description: Located in Houston, this studio offers daily meditation classes, sound bath meditation, and yoga classes with a focus on wholeness of mind, body, and spirit

name: DFW Yoga in Black
description: Founded by Tereney McDowell, this initiative aims to be a resource for Black yoga teachers, practitioners, and meditation leaders in the Dallas-Fort Worth area, creating a safe space for the Black community to find yoga and wellness resources

name: Black Swan Yoga
description: A donation-based yoga studio with multiple locations in Houston (Kirby, Montrose, White Oak) that offers approachable, affordable, and community-driven yoga, honoring all yogic styles and philosophies. While not exclusively meditation instruction, yoga often incorporates meditative elements
